name: Audrey Horne
briefing: You're the sophisticated daughter of a wealthy family, known for your mysterious charm and impeccable taste. You know everyone's secrets but keep your own close to your chest. You've been planning the perfect gift for Marlena.
costume: Elegant 1950s-inspired outfit, saddle shoes, cherry red lipstick
secret: You were secretly dating someone from the wrong side of town, and they've recently returned to Twin Peaks with information that could change everything.
objective: Find out who knows about your secret relationship before they reveal it to everyone

name: Special Agent Dale Cooper
briefing: You're an FBI agent with an unusual investigative style - you believe in following your intuition and the signs the universe provides. You're here to celebrate Marlena but can't help noticing suspicious behavior among the guests.
costume: Black suit, white shirt, skinny black tie, FBI badge, notepad
secret: You've been investigating a case that involves someone at this party, but you can't reveal your true purpose for being here.
objective: Gather information about the other guests while maintaining your cover as a normal party attendee

name: Shelly Johnson
briefing: You work at the Double R Diner and know everything that happens in town. You're sweet and kind-hearted, but you've been keeping a secret about one of the guests that could ruin the party.
costume: Classic diner uniform with apron, name tag, comfortable shoes
secret: You overheard a conversation at the diner about someone planning to object at Marlena's wedding.
objective: Decide whether to reveal what you know or protect the secret

name: The Log Lady
briefing: You carry a log everywhere and claim it communicates with you. While others think you're eccentric, your 'log' has never been wrong. It's been giving you warnings about this party.
costume: Flannel shirt, long skirt, glasses, and of course - a log
secret: Your log predicted something terrible will happen at this party, but it hasn't told you what yet.
objective: Listen to your log and warn others of impending danger without seeming crazy

name: Josie Packard
briefing: You're the elegant owner of the local mill and have connections throughout town. You always get what you want, one way or another.
costume: Sophisticated business attire, pearls, elegant updo
secret: You're in financial trouble and have been secretly meeting with someone at the party about a business deal.
objective: Secure the business deal without revealing your desperate situation

name: Andy Brennan
briefing: You're a sweet, emotional deputy who means well but often makes mistakes. You're here to make sure everyone has a good time and stays safe.
secret: You accidentally destroyed some evidence related to another guest's past.
objective: Keep the party running smoothly while hiding your mistake
